pr_title: Upgrade to AGP 4.1.0-beta2 + Gradle 6.5.1 for project apk-size.

timeline.message:
Revert "Repack apk files into zip format to generate stable size measurements. (#1719)"

This reverts commit 3c9f4316e3512013a96bdea50938d1ffe11c1ee3.

Upgrade to AGP 4.1.0-beta2 + Gradle 6.5.1 for project apk-size.

This change helps stablize the size of generated APKs.
https://groups.google.com/a/google.com/g/android-gradle-discuss/c/D75NhZpcfBM

timeline.author: yifanyang
